welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yuba City, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of Northern California. Known for its rich agricultural heritage and vibrant community, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Yuba City.
restaurants.address: 1325 Sunsweet Blvd (at Highway 99), Yuba City, CA 95993
